column5: I am based out of Ottawa... don't fish pembroke much - so much good fishing locally!
Redpine nice!!We stay at Garden Island Lodge.I love it there we've had some cow's!and not just pickerel but some big smallies too!!! FC
Just signed up and wanted to say Hi... If you want to talk Ottawa fishing drop me a line! Cheers LK

Not a fly in but a remote drive in resort - Silver Water Wheel Lodge on Lac Seul - 40 miles north of Dryden, walleye and northern fishing out of this world and the resort is the same, low key, fullly guided, american plan, small and service oriented.
Hi Lonnie, Welcome to a great fishing site. We go through Ottawa and buy leeches on our way North to Senneterre and the Goun. Seanik
Hey Seanik - I have to agree that this site is hardcore.. lots of real technical discussions taking place... I think i will fit right in!!

Welcome Lonnie!!Like others I see Ottawa when we go N to Lady Evelyn.I have on my to do list to one day fish the river for Ski's!!!!I've read so much about it.I'd love to hear about your exploits in Ottawa!!!FC
hey fishin crazy - I have fished lady evelyn as well... walleye factory - we stayed at redpine lodge.cheers,LK
Welcome Lonniethis is a great site to belong to.Are you close to Pembroke Ontario ?
